content: anybody any experiences with using FHIR to model microbio results?
As a starting point, see the DiagnosticReport example here
hi @Susanne Seuchter I am also in this process. Right now, I guess we will be using the specimen resource together with the observation resource. Glad to collaborate

Specimen, Observation, Sequence, ImagingStudy, and Substance are the typical resources. Depends on what kind of microbio you're doing, of course. If Specimen isn't enough for your needs, there's also BiologicallyDerivedProduct.

I know this is old, but has this been used as a reference (or starting point) for this; it's the US CDC's Implementation Profile for Microbiology Results messages (in V2 of course): ftp://ftp.ihe.net/MarketingAndPresentations/HIMSS04/vendor_workshop/1_Microbiology_Implementation_Guide_2003-05-27.pdf
